name: Silver Valley
overview:
A Castlevania type game, but with its own personality with different types of mechanics throughout the game, the occasional nod to the retro community like the Pac-Man that you can find throughout the adventure, and those dialogues prior to the boss of end of phase A varied adventure where we will even navigate a river in a boat, or fly in shootem-up-style stages.
This time will have to kill a dragón, but that wont be easy....
64 stages, with an story driving the action, rpg like.
